task_summary: Approach the green trash bin, grasp the lid handle, and lift to open the bin, then verify it is open and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator must open a green garbage bin with a hinged lid. The scene shows a bin beside a table; the robotâ€™s gripper approaches the small handle on the lid. The behavior includes perception to localize the bin and handle, careful approach with yaw alignment, pre-grasp opening of the gripper, grasp closure, and an opening motion abstracted by an OpenContainer action for a bin lid. The robot verifies the lid is open and then retreats to avoid collisions.
preconditions: Robot base positioned with reachable access to bin lid
Bin lid has a graspable handle
No obstacles in immediate opening arc
stepwise_plan: If bin not visible, scan to acquire it
Move above the handle and orient end-effector
success_criteria: Lid angle clearly increased from closed state
Robot retreats to a safe distance
failure_and_recovery: Slip during grasp: reopen, realign, and regrasp
Lid jam: increase approach precision or adjust pull height slightly
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after ContainerOpen is true and the robot has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: Tool yaw alignment near the lid, indicating precise approach to the handle.
frame_3.predicts_next: Closing the gripper and initiating lid opening.

task_instruction: lift open green garbage can lid

node_specs.description: Checks if the green bin is currently visible.
Actively scan to locate the green bin.
Move to a pregrasp pose above the handle.
Rotate tool yaw to align with the handle orientation.
Open gripper wide before grasping the handle.
Precise approach to seat the fingers on the handle.
Close gripper gently on the handle.
Execute opening motion for a bin lid.
Verify that the lid is open.
Back off to a safe distance.

recovery_strategy: Reopen and regrasp with wider width
Abort and retreat if contact forces spike
assumptions: Frames show a hinged bin lid with a small handle; the opening is upward. Instruction matches frames; no conflict noted.

expected_success_criteria: Final pose is a safe standoff
